poem:
### Dehumanisation Today

In the morning's quiet light,  
shadows line the page of time,  
naked, unnamed, a truth  
etched in silver grain,  
enduring whispers  
of dignity stripped bare,  
bones laid cold by history's  
unforgiving hand.  
Yet in defiance,  
the soul mends,  
fierce as the sun,  
in the dawn  
of recognition.
